lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich manager Pep Guardiola is looking for a new challenge and wants to work in the Premier League, he said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola Says He Wants to Coach in England-Reports
headline.main: Guardiola Says He Wants to Coach in England-Reports

snippet: Bayern Munich manager Pep Guardiola is looking for a new challenge and wants to work in the Premier League, he said on Tuesday....
